title: The Best Barrel Jeans That Seamlessly Pull Together Any Outfit
description: From the subtly ballooned to full-on horseshoes, these are the pairs worth shopping.
excerpt: From brands like Alaïa, Agolde, and Everlane, here are 15 of the best barrel jeans, based on editors’ experience. Shop our favorites to get in on the trend.

html:
The Cuffed Pair

Frame The Bubble High-Rise Barrel Jeans

Dubbed "The Bubble," this high-rise pair presents two equally playful options. Cuff them at the ankle for a casual look, or wear them at their full length should you seek a bit more drama.

Sizes: 23-32

Colors: Westbury, Outlaw, Dorado

The Designer Pair

Alaïa Rounded Leg Denim Pants

Wearing barrel jeans already signals that you’re up on sartorial trends. When you tell the ladies that these are Alaïa, your status will be raised to full-blown fashion hero.

Sizes: 34-44

Colors: Noir Alaia

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Long Pair

EB Denim Frederic Barrel-Leg Jeans

With exaggerated seams and a faded wash, this structured EB Denim pair offers a more elongated look that's absolutely cool-girl approved.

Sizes: 23-32

Colors: Blue Dream, Luca, Foil, Forest, Tramonto, Sundown

The Subtle Pair

Favorite Daughter The Nikki Mid-Rise Barrel Jeans

Here’s a mid-rise barrel that is ever so slight. If you’re not sold on the trend just yet, these could easily pass for a standard straight leg.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: Los Angeles, Venice, Asphalt

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Dramatic Pair

Paige Arellia Barrel Leg Jeans

Paige's dark-denim pair delivers a totally different look from the rest of the pack, with unexpected front panels that boast contrast stitching and silver-tone hardware.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: Selma

The Patch-Pocket Pair

L'Agence Cody High-Rise Rodeo Jeans

If you prefer softer denim to rigid and live for the baggy fit (and convenient pockets) of cargos, this cropped pair from L'Agence gives the best of both worlds.

Sizes: 23-30

Colors: Brentwood

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Ripped Pair

Gap High Rise Barrel Jeans

ELLE’s digital director Claire Stern Milch is a woman on the go. From back-to-back meetings to dinners to casually planning a wedding while she’s at it, items have to earn a place in her wardrobe. This pair passed with flying colors. Gap is so back.

Sizes: 24-35 (Regular, Tall, Petite)

Colors: 8 options

The Black Pair

Everlane The Way-High Curve Jean

These jeans carried ELLE's associate fashion commerce editor Meg Donohue through 2024, and she would like to take a moment to thank Everlane for these heaven-sent pants.

Sizes: 23-33; 27” or 29” inseam

Colors: 6 options

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Low-Rise Pair

B Sides Lasso Ankle Jeans

If you accomplish nothing else today, do yourself this one favor: Buy a pair of off-white jeans. You will be amazed by how often they come in handy. Dale Arden Chong, ELLE’s senior fashion commerce editor (and denim guru of the team), agrees.

Sizes: 24-32

Colors: Cream

The Raw Hem Pair

Citizens of Humanity Horseshoe Superhigh Waist Raw Hem Crop Barrel Jeans

If senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong is feeling a little wild, this is the bold pair she reaches for.

Sizes: 24-33

Colors: 10 options

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Under $150 Pair

Madewell The Darted Barrel-Leg Jean

The best part about a pair like this is that they’re totally timeless—and that they’re another editor-approved option from senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong. You need not worry about passing fads; these will always be stylish.

Sizes: 23-33 (Regular, Petite, Tall)

Colors: Vintage Canvas, Olenda Wash, Irmo Wash, Dobbins Wash

The Ankle Pair

Mother Denim The Half-Pipe Flood

Subtle, isn’t it? Mother Denim’s faded light-wash pair showcases a less heavy-handed approach to the trend.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: This Is How I Roll, Did You Bring Me Anything?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Cut-Out Pair

Still Here Cowgirl Cut-Out Jeans

They’re not rips, they’re cut-outs. With symmetrical placement, these are nothing like the grungy shredded pair of yesteryear. Plus, senior fashion commerce editor Dale Arden Chong is a major fan.

Sizes: 22-32

Colors: Bone, Classic Blue, Vintage Blue, Indigo Indigo, Washed Black

The Relaxed Fit Pair

We The Free Good Luck Mid-Rise Barrel Jeans

These have an effortless street style air about them and are available in wide range of hues.

Sizes: 24-33 (Short, Regular)

Colors: 18 options

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Light Wash Pair

Agolde Luna Pieced High Waist Raw Hem Barrel Jeans

This is, simply, a pair that you could wear day in and day out.

Sizes: 23-34

Colors: Void, Split, Control, Element, Posess

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
